table.name: ws_country
table.viewSql: SELECT country.name, country.code, country.capital, country.area, country.population FROM country WHERE ((country.code)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['AUS'::character varying, 'NZ'::character varying, 'USA'::character varying, 'N'::character varying, 'S'::character varying, 'IS'::character varying, 'DK'::character varying, 'SF'::character varying, 'DK'::character varying, 'FL'::character varying, 'CH'::character varying])::text[]));

table.name: ws_encompasses
table.viewSql: SELECT encompasses.country, encompasses.continent, encompasses.percentage FROM encompasses WHERE ((encompasses.country)::text IN ( SELECT ws_country.code FROM ws_country));

table.name: ws_is_member
table.viewSql: SELECT is_member.country, is_member.organization FROM is_member WHERE (((is_member.country)::text IN ( SELECT ws_country.code FROM ws_country)) AND ((is_member.organization)::text IN ( SELECT ws_organization.abbreviation FROM ws_organization)));

table.name: ws_organization
table.viewSql: SELECT organization.abbreviation, organization.city, organization.established FROM organization WHERE ((organization.abbreviation)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['EFTA'::character varying, 'NC'::character varying, 'ANZUS'::character varying, 'NATO'::character varying])::text[]));
